answers.answer: Hopefully, the consequences will be many happy smiling children and you will all live happily ever after.The consideration should be irrelevant.There are many causes of diabetes. If you are concerned as to whether the children may have a chance of developing the disease, maybe yes and maybe no. Certainly "not necessarily". This is something to be discussed with your mother's physician (if she gives you permission) and your girl's physician (if he gives you permission).

question: can u please advice me the consequences if i marry a diabetic girl, iam a non diabetic and my mother is diabetic
title: If i marry a diabetic girl
